   $(this).find(\"img\").attr(\"src\", ctx + \"/img/icons/edit_weiss.png\");\n                        });\n                        $(\".toC .item\").mouseleave(function () {\n        if ((!$(this).hasClass(\"active\")) && $(this).hasClass(\"themen\")) {\n                                $(this).find(\"img\").attr(\"src\", ctx + \"/img/icons/edit_mathelv.png\");\n                            }\n                        });\n                        containerId = \"7MKKVK7OA59ZUFT6PJ\";\n                        subjectId = \"cu7eha6e6hugabresw\";\n                    });\n                    function showJahrgang() {\n                        $(\".toC\").find(\".themenstrukturiert\").hide();\n                        $(\".toC\").find(\".jahrgangstrukturiert\").fadeIn();\n                        $(\"body\").find(\".switch.jahrgangstrukturiert\").hide();\n                        $(\"body\").find(\".switch.themenstrukturiert\").fadeIn();\n                function showThemen() {\n                        $(\".toC\").find(\".jahrgangstrukturiert\").hide();\n                        $(\".toC\").find(\".themenstrukturiert\").fadeIn();\n                        $(\"body\").find(\".switch.themenstrukturiert\").hide();\n                        $(\"body\").find(\".switch.jahrgangstrukturiert\").fadeIn();\n $('#suchvorschlagPanel').find('div').removeClass('focussed');\n                                    }\n                                }\n                            } else if (event.keyCode === 38) {\n                                event.preventDefault();\n                                event.stopImmediatePropagation();\n                                console.log('Arrow Up');\n                                if ($('#suchvorschlagPanel').css('display') === 'none') {\n                                    console.log('Noch keine Suchvorschläge sichtbar');\n                                } else {\n                                    console.log('Bereits Suchvorschläge sichtbar');\n                                    if (thisIndex >= 0) {\n                                        thisIndex--;\n                                        $('#suchvorschlagPanel').find('div').removeClass('focussed');\n                                        $($('#suchvorschlagPanel').find('div').toArray()[thisIndex]).addClass('focussed');\n                                    }\n                                    if (thisIndex < 0) {\n                                        $('#suchvorschlagPanel').find('div').removeClass('focussed');\n                                    }\n                                }\n                            } else {\n                                addSuchvorschlaege($(this).val());\n                            }\" autocomplete=\"off\" name=\"sucheingabe\" id=\"sucheingabe\" style=\"margin-left:0px;padding-left:10px width=\"auto\">\n                </div>\n            </form>\n            <div id=\"suchvorschlagPanel\" style=\"margin-left:10px;display:none;position:absolute;width:640px;max-height:360px;border:1px stretchy=\"false\">(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=\"false\">)</mo><mo>⋅</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>?</mo><mo stretchy=\"false\">(</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=\"false\">)</mo></span></span></span><script type=\"math/tex1\" id=\"MathJax-Elements-2\">f(x)=(5x + 1) \\cdot \\sin (x^2)</script>.\n\n<div align=\"right\">(2P)</div> \n\n\n <!-- alter 0.434em;\">+</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-21\" class=\"mjx-msubsup MJXc-space2\"><span class=\"mjx-base\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-22\" class=\"mjx-mi\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-math-I\" 0.071em;\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-23\" class=\"mjx-mn\" style=\"\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-main-R\" style=\"padding-top: 0.38em; padding-bottom: 0.326em;\">2</span></span></span></span><span class=\"mjx-mi MJXc-space2\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-math-I\" style=\"padding-top: 0.218em; padding-bottom: 0.272em;\">x</span></span></span></span><span class=\"MJX_Assistive_MathML\" role=\"presentation\"><span class=\"display:none;\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML\"><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy=\"false\">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=\"false\">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle=\"true\" scriptlevel=\"0\"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mstyle><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></span></span></span><script type=\"math/tex1\" id=\"MathJax-Element-2\">f(x)= - \\dfrac{1}{6}x^3 + x^2 - x</script> besitzt einen Wendepunkt.\n<br>\nZeige, dass <span class=\"MathJax_Preview\" style=\"color: inherit;\"></span><span id=\"MathJax-Element-3-Frame\" class=\"mjx-chtml MathJax_CHTML\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"font-size: 116%; position: relative;\" data-mathml=\"<math scriptlevel=&quot;0&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mstyle></span>\" role=\"presentation\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-26\" class=\"mjx-math\" role=\"math\" aria-hidden=\"true\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-27\" class=\"mjx-mrow\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-28\" class=\"mjx-mi\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-math-I\" style=\"padding-top: 0.218em; padding-bottom: 0.488em; padding-right: 0.006em;\">y</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-29\" class=\"mjx-mo MJXc-space3\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-main-R\" style=\"padding-top: 0.057em; padding-bottom: 0.326em;\">=</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-30\" class=\"mjx-mi MJXc-space3\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-math-I\" style=\"padding-top: 0.218em; padding-bottom: 0.272em;\">x</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-31\" class=\"mjx-mo MJXc-space2\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-main-R\" style=\"margin-top: 0.003em; padding-bottom: 0.326em;\">−</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-32\" class=\"mjx-mstyle url(\"/mathjax/fonts/HTML-CSS/TeX/otf/MathJax_Size4-Regular.otf\") format(\"opentype\")}\n</style><h2>Aufgabe 8</h2>\n\nBei einem Glücksrad werden die Zahlen <span class=\"MathJax_Preview\" id=\"MathJax-Element-3\">3</script> und <span class=\"MathJax_Preview\" style=\"color: inherit;\"></span><span id=\"MathJax-Element-4-Frame\" class=\"mjx-chtml MathJax_CHTML\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"font-size: 116%; position: relative;\" data-mathml=\"<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn></span>\" role=\"presentation\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-10\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML\"><mn>4</mn></span></span></span><script type=\"math/tex1\" id=\"MathJax-Element-4\">4</script> bei einmaligem Drehen mit folgenden Wahrscheinlichkeiten angezeigt:\n<div class=\"abstand_ntext\"></div>\n<!-- fuer links- oder rechtsbuendig text-align:left bzw. right; Blocksatz mit text-align:justify -->\n<div align=\"center\">\n<table cellpadding=\"7\" border=\"1\">\n <tbody><tr>\n<td>Zahl</td><td>1</td><td>2</td><td>3</td><td>4</td>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n<td>Wahrscheinlichkeit</td><td>0,4</td><td>0,1</td><td>0,3</td><td>0,2</td>\n</tr>\n</tbody></table>\n</div>\n<div class=\"abstand_ntext\"></div>\n<div class=\"aufgabe standard\">\na)\n</div>\n<div class=\"text standard\">Das Glücksrad wird einmal gedreht.\n<br>\nGib zwei verschiedene Ereignisse an, deren Wahrscheinlichkeit jeweils <span class=\"MathJax_Preview\" style=\"color: inherit;\"></span><span id=\"MathJax-Element-5-Frame\" class=\"mjx-chtml MathJax_CHTML\" tabindex=\"0\" style=\"font-size: 116%; position: relative;\" data-mathml=\"<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn></span>\" role=\"presentation\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-13\" class=\"mjx-math\" role=\"math\" aria-hidden=\"true\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-14\" class=\"mjx-mrow\"><span id=\"MJXc-Node-15\" class=\"mjx-mn\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-main-R\" style=\"padding-top: 0.38em; padding-bottom: 0.38em;\">0</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-16\" class=\"mjx-mo\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-main-R\" style=\"margin-top: -0.159em; padding-bottom: 0.541em;\">,</span></span><span id=\"MJXc-Node-17\" class=\"mjx-mn MJXc-space1\"><span class=\"mjx-char MJXc-TeX-main-R\" style=\"padding-top: 0.38em; padding-bottom: Die Kugeln berühren einander von außen im Punkt <span class=\"MathJax_Preview\" style=\"color: inherit;\"></span><span id=\"MathJax-Element-7-Frame\" class=\"mjx-chtml MathJax_CHTML\" tabindex=\"0\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML\"><mi>B</mi></span></span></span><script type=\"math/tex1\" id=\"MathJax-Element-7\">B</script>.\n<br>\nBeschreibe ein Verfahren, mit dem man <span
